TopicTitle: Are mod parts non-programmable in Unity?

Articles.Content: If I add a C# script to a Unity object and then compile that to .mu will it run in-game? Do I have to write a plugin to add any functionality at all?
Honestly I'm not quite sure... I know that your class has to be a PartModule and not a Monobehaviour, but that's about it. Go ahead and try it! I'd be interested in results.
